EmailTemplate.name: The Business Data Lake – an evolution in Data Infrastructure.Follow Up - No show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You Yesterday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: The Business Data Lake – an Evolution in Data Infrastructure We're sorry we missed you.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We noticed that you were unable to join us yesterday for the fifth installment in our "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series. This session featured Steve Jones, Senior Director of Big Data and Analytics of Capgemeni, and covered the evolution of data infrastructure. Please feel free to watch the on-demand replay here <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/The_Business_Data_Lake_an_evolution_in_Data_Infrastructure.m4v>.
At Pivotal, we continually work to offer educational opportunities that empower a global marketplace of organizations. If you have a minute or two, we would appreciate you taking this short survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/HZST27S> to let us know why you were unable to attend the session and how we might improve these webinars in the future.
Stay tuned for registration information for our February installment.
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
